data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Magalhães, Wagner F., Weidhase, Michael, Schulze, Anja, Bailey-Brock, Julie H. (2016): Taxonomic remarks on the genus Ctenodrilus (Annelida: Cirratulidae) including description of a new species from the Pacific Ocean. Zootaxa 4103 (4): 325-343, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4103.4.2
